title: NO FEE - FULL WINDOWS - Best Deal In Brighton for a TRUE 1 bed
map_address: 41 Chestnut Hill Ave near Academy Hill Rd.
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 303059475', 'Rent: $1,895 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/17/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'AVAILABLE AUGUST 17th or SEPTEMBER 1  FOR 12 MONTHS.', '- PARKING AVAILABLE FOR 150 PER MONTH -', 'This is a one bedroom 1 bathroom apartment in the Brighton Center neighborhood in Boston.', 'This is a great commuter location as the B line train is .5 miles away this equals a quick ten minute stroll to the train station.', 'Catch the 57 86 or 66 bus routes as well for a quick trip to Downtown Boston or Allston areas.', 'The bedroom is very large with plenty of space for additional furniture.', 'The bedroom is very large with plenty of space for additional furniture.', 'This bedroom will even accommodate a king size bed set!', 'There is a balcony off of the eat in kitchen and enough room for a table and with a great view!.', ' Lots of cabinets.', 'Laundry room is in the basement.', 'Four washers, four dryers.', 'To view this apartment or for any questions, please send inquires about this apartment to David']
